I recently stayed at Perak Hotel Singapore and unfortunately, my experience was far from satisfactory. From the moment I arrived, I encountered issues that made my stay unpleasant.

Firstly, the room was much smaller than advertised, and it felt cramped and claustrophobic. The cleanliness was also subpar‚ÄîI found dust on the furniture, and the bathroom had a lingering musty smell. The towels provided were thin and worn out, which was disappointing for a hotel that claims to offer comfort.

The noise level was unbearable. The walls seemed paper-thin, and I could hear every conversation, door slam, and footstep from the hallway and adjacent rooms. It was impossible to get a good night's sleep.

The staff, while not outright rude, were indifferent and unhelpful. When I raised concerns about the noise and cleanliness, they offered no solutions or apologies. It felt like they simply didn‚Äôt care about guest satisfaction.

Lastly, the location, while central, was not as convenient as I had hoped. The area was crowded and noisy, and the hotel itself lacked the charm and amenities I expected for the price.

Overall, my stay at Perak Hotel Singapore was a letdown. I would not recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a comfortable and pleasant stay in Singapore. There are far better options in the area for the same price or even less.

I was keen to Stay in Little India Area and was looking out for an affordable option and hence Perak Hotel got my attention meeting these two criteria.
turned out the only good thing about the property is it's location (1 minute walk to Bus and MRT).
1.The front desk lady was horrible, and reminded me of my school headmaster. she was utterly rude from the start and she upfront said that you have to give us room keys when you step out and we won't be responsible for your belongings
2. hotel staff was shady too. we did not feel comfortable when they were around.
3. breakfast was as good as not available.
4. Room's cleanliness was out of question. Ants and Spider webs all over.
5. washroom was so small and the sewer pipe was right in the shower cubicle so you could literally hear when the floor above you was flushing.
6. room's has zero sound proofing. sound from all directions keep coming.
7.moreover the hotel does not allow you to keep your luggage even for 2 hours after your checkout with them. we had to book a luggage service separately.

Overall do not recommend to stay here and do not fall for lower pricing as the hotel is not even worth this.
